title: Khmer! Khmer!: Cambodia in conflict (D)

description: Portrays the life, culture, history and politics of the Cambodians. Focuses on Norodom Sihanouk's abdication from the throne and becoming the first Democratic Leader of Cambodia, thus destroying the old feudal system and through to social and political destruction during the Vietnam War. Narrated by Richard Oxenburgh. WARNING: Contains graphic scenes of war related deaths.
